dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hello, I'm looking for the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: I'm afraid you can't leave yet. You need to answer my riddle first.

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: What can be broken, but never held? What can be given, but never sold?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: Very good! You're free to go.
